name: TolMol
tag_list: tolmol, comparison-shopping, india-comparison-shopping, compare-prices, product-reviews, car-comparison, product-comparison, travel-comparison
overview:
TolMol is a comparison service for India market. It enables its users to search, compare and find the best deal on shopping, travel, careers and more, both from online and local sources.

In single TolMol search, users can find information on thousands of products and services from multiple websites and various local sources across major cities in India. The users can also compare product features and prices side by side. Unbiased product and seller reviews and ratings further help users make an informed decision.

For travelers, TolMol offers airfare vs. train fare comparison along with the special travel deals to choose from. Though TolMol doesn’t sell tickets on its site, it seamlessly connects travelers to the source airline/train/agency website to book the ticket(s) directly with the provider.

Introduced recently, TolMol Careers offers one search access to jobs from all major portals, classified sites, agencies, and company websites. It makes dream career search more effective by offering a platform to network with quality professionals having different backgrounds and work experience.
